title: Python wrapper to get domain level information (with command line)
author: cyriacthomas
content: readme.md domnibuswrapper collect infomration possible around domaininstallationpip install domnibususagepython domnibus import domnibusd = domnibus('google.com') method domnibus.allowed_methods: print "{} details".format(method) print d[method] can access data d.<method>command-linegeneric usagedomni <method> domainsexampleslist methodsdomni ls domni listssl
